oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Conversations: from Alan Turing to NP-completeness
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RADHAKRISHNAN, J
COOK, SA
PARIKH, RJ
GOPALKRISHNAN, M
SOHONI, M
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Scientists from various fields met at the Tata Institute of Fundamental Research on 2 January 2013 to discuss Alan Turing's legacy. A panel consisting of the following made initial statements around which the discussion was conducted.
